short_summary: Roof Repair at the Joseph Ghiz Building ( approx. 1800m2 )
description: The work includes the removal of gypsum board, insulation, and an existing roof system to be replaced with a new 20-year warranted modified bitumen roll insulated roof system. The contractor shall perform and complete the work within 16 weeks. The estimated cost is between $500001 to $1000000 CAD, including HST.
full_summary:
### Roof Repair, Joseph Ghiz Building, Summerside PE

**Tender Announcement**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for the Roof Repair project at the Joseph Ghiz Building in Summerside, Prince Edward Island.

**Project Overview**
The scope of work includes:

* Removing approximately 1800 m2 of insulated existing roof system
* Installing a new 20-year warranted modified bitumen roll insulated roof system
* Completing the work within 16 weeks of award

**Eligibility and Qualification**
To be considered eligible, contractors must meet the qualification requirements outlined in the ITQ document. The prequalification process is a two-phase process: the first phase evaluates the qualifications of interested suppliers, while the second phase invites qualified bidders to submit a financial proposal based on the project specifications and drawings.

**Key Dates**

* **Publication Date**: August 29, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 19, 2023, at 14:00 (Atlantic Daylight Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None

**Documents and Language**
The ITQ document may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

**Estimated Cost and Funding**
The estimated cost for this project falls within the range of $500,001 to $1,000,000, including HST.

**Contact Information**

* Sonia Stockman, Contracting Officer
* Email: [sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None

**Notice URL**

[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17298704?extsite=MTcyOTg3MDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17298704?extsite=MTcyOTg3MDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Visit the link above to access the ITQ document and learn more about the project. *
